title: Miley Cyrus hospitalised and boyfriend Cody Simpson rushes to be by her side

Miley Cyrus has been checked into hospital after falling ill with tonsillitis.

The Bangers singer took to Instagram to document her health battle and revealed that her new beau Cody Simpson was on his way to help nurse her better.

She told fans that the Australian hunk was dashing to keep her company while she was receiving medical attention.

Miley even referred to him as her 'boyfriend' despite them only dating a few short weeks.

(Image: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Last month Miley was seen out with Kaitlynn Carter which followed on from her split from husband Liam Hemsworth after one year of marriage.

But Miley seems smitten with the new man in her life as she admitted she felt the 'luckiest' to have him by her side as she recovered from her throat infection.

The Wrecking Ball singer's mum also paid her a visit in hospital.

Miley shared a snap of Tish combing her blonde locks to help make her feel better.

(Image: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

The pop star is set to appear at Gorillapalooza festival this weekend. The charity event was set up by talk show host Ellen DeGeneneras in support of conservation for gorillas.

"Send good vibes my way!" Miley pleaded with her fans alongside a picture of her with a drip in her arm.

"Hoping the Rock star G*DS send me a boost of bad a** and help me kick this s*** to the curb where it belongs! We got gorillas to save!" urged the animal lover.

(Image: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

Miley's latest whirlwind relationship appears to be getting serious.

The singer spoke out about their 'make out sessions' last week and said Cody was just 'her type.'

Sharing a snap of them snogging, Miley wrote: "22 [check] Australian (my type) [check] Abs [check]."

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

(Image: Instagram)

"Can a girl not get a f***ing açai bowl and a morning make out session in peace?!?!” she joked.

Miley is said to have called things off with Kaitlynn Carter last month over reported concerns things were getting too serious.
description: The couple have only be dating a few weeks
